thread.title: Victoria still keeps sunglasses on in rainy London
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham still keeps sunglasses on in rainy London | Daily Mail Online

author: Ellie Genower
title: Victoria still keeps sunglasses on in rainy London
text:
It may have been a typically grey and drizzly winter's day in London, but Victoria Beckham was determined to maintain her fashionista image.
The 42-year-old designer kept her favourite sunglasses firmly on, despite the dim light as she headed out for a shopping trip in West London on Thursday.
Dressed in fitted wide legged trousers and an olive green polo-neck, Victoria cut a typically chic figure as she made her way to her car.
Shades of grey: Voctoria Beckham firmly kept her famous sunglasses on during a trip shopping in West London, despite the murky weather
Smarten up in wide leg black trousers like Victoria Beckham Victoria, Victoria Beckham Pre-Autumn/ Winter 2017
Sold out- click to shop the current collection
Buy now
Victoria Beckham was looking as chic as ever as she ran errands in London this week, wearing a pair of black slouch wide leg trousers teamed with a khaki green turtleneck jumper. VB then accessorised her look with a pair of white trainers and her signature oversized shades.
We're loving these relaxed fit trews which are from Victoria's own eponymous collection, the wide legs and high waist are guaranteed to elongate your pins to supermodel proportions; meanwhile the black colour makes them super versatile.
These trousers won't be available until May but you can check out the current collection by following the link on the right or for more choice scroll through our edit of alternatives in the carousel below.
A great workwear wardrobe update, style with a crisp white shirt and flats for a chic office look, or pair with heel, a tee and a clutch for a night out.

The star wore her brunette tresses in a loose updo and sported minimal make-up.
Victoria, who has for a long time abandoned high heels in favour of flat shoes, seemed to be wearing white trainers for her day out.
The former Spice Girl was without her children Brooklyn, 17, Romeo, 14, Cruz, 11, and five-year-old daughter Harper for her trip.
Effortlessly stylish: Dressed in fitted wide legged trousers and an olive green polo-neck, Victoria cut a typically chic figure as she made her way to her car
Shop til I drop: David Beckham headed out to the Adidas Store with friend David Gardner on Wednesday
Sports mad: Dave Gardner and David have been firm friends for years
The brunette recently posted an Instagram shot of her brood cuddling up to their father David Beckham as he returned to Los Angeles earlier this week after a solo trip away.
Only the 41-year-old star's eyes can be seen as he's mobbed by his four kids for a group hug, with pet pooch Olive also posing for the picture.
'Victoria captioned the heart-warming picture: 'I think they love him! We ❤ you @davidbeckham X VB'.
David was also shopping - recently spotted heading out on Wednesday to the Adidad Store with best pal Dave Gardner.
Homecoming: David was seen cuddling up to his entire brood in a rare family snapshot, posted to Instagram on Monday morning by his devoted wife Victoria
He recently opened up about his marriage to fashion designer Victoria during a special 75th anniversary edition of Radio 4's Desert Island Discs.
He admitted the pair, who met at a Manchester United game in 1997, recently renewed their wedding vows.
The retired footballer revealed: 'We did throw a lot at (our first wedding). We have renewed our vows since then and it was a lot more private, there was about six people there in our house.
Tell-all interview: David recently opened up about his marriage to fashion designer Victoria during a special 75th anniversary edition of Radio 4's Desert Island Discs
Further on in the insightful interview, he stated that the secret to his and Victoria's marriage is being able to 'work through' the 'tough times'.
He admits that he and Victoria know each other inside out - and it is this mutual love and understanding of each other and their children that has kept them together for so long.
Having remained mostly tight-lipped about their relationship over the years, the sportsman is quick to gush about his marriage to the designer as he chatted to host Kirsty Young.
Close bond: He admits that he and Victoria know each other inside out - and it is this mutual love and understanding of each other and their children that has kept them together
